# registerObject(_:visibility:)

**Instance Method**

Adds representations of a specified object to an item provider, based on the object’s implementation of the item provider writing protocol, and adhering to a visibility specification.

## Declaration

```swift
func registerObject(_ object: any NSItemProviderWriting, visibility: NSItemProviderRepresentationVisibility)
```

## Discussion

If a representation for a given UTI is already registered, it is preserved (specifically, duplicate representations are ignored).

## Registering objects

- **registerObject(ofClass:visibility:loadHandler:)**: Lazily adds representations of a specified object class to an item provider, based on the object’s implementation of the item provider writing protocol, and adhering to a visibility specification.
- **registerObject(ofClass:visibility:loadHandler:)**: Lazily adds representations of a specified object type to an item provider, based on the object’s implementation of the item provider writing protocol, and adhering to a visibility specification.
- **register(_:)**: Adds representations of a specified transferable type to an item provider.
